authors.name: Benjamin Franklin
quotes: He that would live in peace & at ease, Must not speak all he knows or judge all he sees.
Glass, China, and Reputation, are easily crackâ€™d, and never well mended.
Love your Enemies, for they tell you your Faults.

authors.name: Albert Einstein
quotes: If you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself.
Never memorize something that you can look up.

authors.name: Theodore Roosevelt
quotes: The only man who never makes mistakes is the man who never does anything.
If you could kick the person in the pants responsible for most of your trouble, you wouldn't sit for a month.
Courage is not having the strength to go on; it is going on when you don't have the strength.
